entry.title: The Witness
entry.content:
The Witness

As the thing goes, I'have deeper and deeper belief that I'm a underqualified player using the devices I made myself to play through my life, all the luck and chances, all the humble obessions I hold, all the great people I've met, pushes me to crack the gate of the next era;

I am the witness of the person of grand miracle, while having the freedom of life, not only in California, I've lost much tough experienced a lot during my whole life of loving, fighting, and escaping;

Thank you, whoever created this or just the luck that formed this great world, thank to myself, for not give up on the way of exploring.

entry.title: People Matters
entry.content:
People Matters

I was so interested in write someting that's eternal and ellegant then keep it in some undestroyable castle of data like the Github server database so I'm gonna be somehow sealed in the human legacy.

So many things I tried to make writing easier, cooler or more interesting, like using Zola, the high-efficiency blog frame, neovim-theme, the coolest blog theme ever, I even listened carefully to the writing class in the university, but none of those pushed significant increase of my willing of writing, or let's say developing this blog.

Then it comes out, the math is there, the truth is there, the only reason I should write is not to invent some new truth in this ellegant world (Otherwise I'll make video games), but rather for the people who may wants to read, get understanded or saved, that was what language made for, luckily I didn't forgot it in the end, and here I am to write it up, or even better: We the people are together to build it, in the god we trust.

Or let's say: In the math we trust.

entry.title: Turn of fortune
entry.content:
Turn of fortune

Since landing in California, dragging my ailing body along, I've been so lucky like playing video game, all the things and opportunities I've ever dreamed of and lost have reappeared in my life.

I've gained profound enlightenment about life, career has flourished unexpectedly, my mental have gradually healed, to the point where I no longer keep my old firend: death in mind.

entry.title: My Life Vectors
entry.content:
My Life Vectors

As you can think about everything reasonably and it seems everything is already known or be able to reveal to you, it's easy to fall into a partial best solution, that's when you need to use an model of your motivation that's as ellegant as your understanding of the world: basic vectors, every choice you make will be put in this high-dimension (of course, low dimension if you only have a few specific core value) field to be easily evaluated. For me, those vectors are:

Love

Truth

Art

Justice

Fun

entry.title: My Standards of People
entry.content:

Knows the world is the informatical reflection of the complex structure based on those basic rules and units, and all the other rules or descriptions are just the combination of those complex systems

2. Reality over stand & Respects other souls:

Follows the previous rule, think about the question that not limited on the person's own benefits, stiff knowledge, or just laziness or stupity. Especially not an abstract object that the person can't even describe or understand alself that has been created on their head by bias or propaganda.

3. Dare and force alselves to take responsibility:

Even when it's just thinking and talking about a complex thing, don't avoid the responsibility of

Even decided to do a stupid thing that doesn't worths it in the logical sense, or decided to let someone else to take the responsibility together.

4. Have sense of ellegant and art:

Romantic, Simple/Ellegant, Interesting, Logical.
